author: TheOneMightyArc
install_msg:
AntiRaid installed. Use `[p]antiraid toggle` to start.
Set a log channel: `[p]antiraid logchannel #logs`
Set a ping role: `[p]antiraid pingrole @Mods`
name: AntiRaid
short: Prevents raids by monitoring message velocity and mentions.
description: Monitors chat for spam (message velocity) and mass mentions. If limits are exceeded, it punishes the user, logs the action to a channel, and pings a designated role.
